item.title: Sara add a quote by Robert Frost
item.description:
"The Road Not Taken
Two roads diverged in a yellow wood, And sorry I could not travel both And be one traveler, long I stood And looked down one as far as I could To where it bent in the undergrowth;
Then took the other, as just as fair, And having perhaps the better claim, Because it was grassy and wanted wear; Though as for that the passing there Had worn them really about the same,
And both that morning equally lay In leaves no step had trodden black. Oh, I kept the first for another day! Yet knowing how way leads on to way, I doubted if I should ever come back.
I shall be telling this with a sigh Somewhere ages and ages hence: Two roads diverged in a wood, and I— I took the one less traveled by, And that has made all the difference." -- Robert Frost

item.title: Sara add a quote by E.E. Cummings
item.description:
"I carry your heart with me (I carry it in my heart)I am never without it (anywhere I go you go,my dear; and whatever is done by only me is your doing,my darling) I fear no fate (for you are my fate,my sweet)I want no world (for beautiful you are my world,my true) and it's you are whatever a moon has always meant and whatever a sun will always sing is you
here is the deepest secret nobody knows (here is the root of the root and the bud of the bud and the sky of the sky of a tree called life; which grows higher than the soul can hope or mind can hide) and this is the wonder that's keeping the stars apart
I carry your heart (I carry it in my heart)" -- E.E. Cummings

item.title: Sara add a quote by Plato
item.description: "Every heart sings a song, incomplete, until another heart whispers back. Those who wish to sing always find a song. At the touch of a lover, everyone becomes a poet." -- Plato

item.title: Sara add a quote by Kahlil Gibran
item.description: "You talk when you cease to be at peace with your thoughts." -- Kahlil Gibran

item.title: Sara add a quote by Cassandra Clare
item.description: "Only the very weak-minded refuse to be influenced by literature and poetry." -- Cassandra Clare

item.title: Sara add a quote by Peter Shaffer
item.description: "The trouble is if you don’t spend your life yourself, other people spend it for you." -- Peter Shaffer

item.title: Sara add a quote by Kent M. Keith
item.description: "If you are kind, people may accuse you of selfish, ulterior motives; be kind anyway. If you are successful, you will win some false friends and true enemies; succeed anyway. If you are honest and frank, people may cheat you; be honest and frank anyway. If you find serenity and happiness, they may be jealous; be happy anyway. The good you do today, people will often forget tomorrow; do good anyway… You see, in the final analysis, it is between you and God; it was never between you and them anyway." -- Kent M. Keith

item.title: Sara add a quote by Douglas Coupland
item.description: "And then I felt sad because I realized that once people are broken in certain ways, they can't ever be fixed, and this is something nobody ever tells you when you are young and it never fails to surprise you as you grow older as you see the people in your life break one by one. You wonder when your turn is going to be, or if it's already happened." -- Douglas Coupland

item.title: Sara add a quote by Carlos Ruiz Zafón
item.description: "People tend to complicate their own lives, as if living weren't already complicated enough." -- Carlos Ruiz Zafón

item.title: Sara add a quote by haruki murakami
item.description: "No matter how much suffering you went through, you never wanted to let go of those memories." -- haruki murakami

item.title: Sara add a quote by Santosh Kalwar
item.description: "We are addicted to our thoughts. We cannot change anything if we cannot change our thinking." -- Santosh Kalwar

item.title: Sara add a quote by Steve Maraboli
item.description: "Happiness is not the absence of problems, it's the ability to deal with them." -- Steve Maraboli

item.title: Sara add a quote by Santosh Kalwar
item.description: "I don't care what you say to me. I care what you share with me." -- Santosh Kalwar
